application.name: GNOME Radio 64 for GNOME 44
application.summary: Listen to National Public Radio on GNOME 44

description.p: GNOME Radio 64 is a Free Software program that allows you easily listen to National Public Radio (NPR) broadcasts under GNOME 44.
GNOME Radio 64 is developed on the GNOME 44 desktop platform and it requires GTK4, Clutter and GStreamer 1.0 for playback.
Enjoy National Public Radio (NPR) broadcasts under GNOME 44.
